Yes this does not work on Oracle VirtualBox 4.0.4. Tried with the Mac OSX and Other OS options in Virtual Box

If not work on Oracle VM VirtualBox v4.0.4 (typically AMD cpus) change this settings: Select system -> chipset-> ICH9 then click container (vdi's/cd/etc settings) click controller -> select parameters -> type ICH6. 
Thats it! :-)
